20110126074138.000|20110126074140.000|CC1|TRADITION CONTINUED.

20110126074202.000|20110126074204.000|CC1|JOBS ARE GONE, BUT BECAUSE SHE  
20110126074204.000|20110126074205.000|CC1|WANTS TO INSPIRE HER CHILDREN TO

20110126074208.000|20110126074211.000|CC1|AS KATHY SAID, I HOPE ITEMS THEM
20110126074211.000|20110126074212.000|CC1|TO NEVER GIVE UP.               
20110126074212.000|20110126074214.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IT'S STRIKING HOW
